text:
I am not able to start Tomcat, when I am commanding startup, the system takes 
alle the path and the environnment variable but stop aftrer showing Starting 
Tomcat in a new windows. I know that the line %_STARTJAVA% %TOMCAT_OPTS% -
Dtomcat.home="%TOMCAT_HOME%" org.apache.tomcat.startup.Tomcat %2 %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 
%8 %9 is the bug, specially the first part (%_STRARTJAVA%). I don"t think that 
Windows 98 recongnize it or something like that. Please help me!!
creator: natsyl@colba.net

text:
Probably a short environment try to start tomcat with a command.com /e:8192 
startup.bat.. if this not help go to command window set tomcat_home= to the 
right dir set JAVA_HOME to pointing to your JDK and use  tomcat run this way 
the window is not killed and you can see what happen..
creator: nacho@apache.org
